rooms.description: Foyer with a welcoming ambiance, featuring a small seating area and storage for shoes and coats.
Open-plan living room with floor-to-ceiling windows, offering ample natural light and views of the garden.
Modern open-plan kitchen equipped with state-of-the-art appliances, a center island for casual dining, and ample counter space.
Dining area adjacent to the kitchen, with seating for six, perfect for entertaining guests.
Master bedroom with an attached bathroom and a small balcony. The room is designed to be spacious and airy, with large windows.
Guest bedroom with an attached bathroom, designed for comfort with a modern aesthetic.
A quiet study or workspace, ideal for remote work or reading.
Utility area with a washing machine and storage space.

openings.description: Main entrance door with modern design and security features.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living room, offering panoramic views and natural light.
Kitchen window above the sink for ventilation and natural light.

rooms.description: Bedroom with an attached bathroom and a private balcony. Designed for comfort and style.
Guest bedroom with modern amenities and an attached bathroom.
Spacious terrace ideal for relaxation or hosting gatherings, featuring a small seating area and a barbecue grill.

openings.description: Private balcony attached to Bedroom 3, offering a serene outdoor space.
Staircase leading to the terrace from the first floor.
